sentences.en: An astonishing amount of solid wood had been cut.
sentences.cn: 只见满地都是劈好了的结结实实的木柴,简直令人咋舌.

sentences.en: Borrowing is set to soar to an astonishing ￡60 billion.
sentences.cn: 借款很可能猛增至惊人的600亿英镑.

sentences.en: Facing each other, the giraffes were managing to entwine their necks in the most astonishing manner.
sentences.cn: 长颈鹿正面对面地用力将脖子缠绕在一起，那种姿势令人大为惊诧。

sentences.en: He became famous as an inventor of astonishing visual and aural effects.
sentences.cn: 他因发明了神奇的视听效果而出名。

sentences.en: He can perform an astonishing variety of acts, including mime and juggling.
sentences.cn: 他能表演好几种令人惊叹的把戏，包括哑剧和玩杂耍。

sentences.en: Her panache at dealing with the world's media is quite astonishing.
sentences.cn: 她应付世界媒体的派头非常令人吃惊。

sentences.en: His ability to absorb bits of disconnected information was astonishing.
sentences.cn: 他吸收利用互不相关的零碎信息的能耐惊人。

sentences.en: His achievement is astonishing and this book is the jewel in his crown.
sentences.cn: 他的成就令人震惊，而这部书则是他的杰作。

sentences.en: I find life more charming and more astonishing than I'd ever dreamed.
sentences.cn: 我发现生活比我想象的更迷人、更不可思议。

sentences.en: It seems astonishing that Bond got away with so much jiggery-pokery for as long as he did.
sentences.cn: 虽然邦德遭遇的诡计层出不穷，但最后却总能脱离险境，令人惊叹。

sentences.en: It's astonishing, he's learned Latin in three hours!
sentences.cn: 他花了3个小时就学会了拉丁文，真让人吃惊！

sentences.en: She ran 100m in an astonishing 10.9 seconds.
sentences.cn: 她以惊人的10.9秒速度跑完了100米。

sentences.en: The curvature of the spine was astonishing.
The new houses have been built with astonishing speed.
sentences.cn: 这些房子的修建速度快得惊人.

sentences.en: The scene was astonishing to me, to every one standing by.
sentences.cn: 这情景使我和每一位旁观者都很惊诧.

trans.tran_cn: 令人惊讶的，非常惊人的
trans.tran_en: so surprising that it is difficult to believe
